Name: Hiro
Text: , I am so excited to play labyrinth

Name: Ana
Text: Gabriela stop troubling Hiro. You are always welcome to play with us

Name: Gabriela
Text: Hiro I was just joking don't take it seriously, I am sorry you felt bad

Text: It's okay Gabriela, I kinda figured it out
